info.title: UI Backend API
info.description: REST API for the UI Backend service providing query submission, user management, and session handling

get.description: Returns server status
Returns public configuration data for the frontend application
Returns current user session status

post.description: Update or expire the current session

get.description: Handles OAuth2 authentication redirects from social providers

302.description: Redirect to application after successful authentication

403.description: Authentication failed or login request expired

get.description: Redirects to OAuth provider for authentication

302.description: Redirect to OAuth provider or application if already authenticated

get.description: Expires session and redirects to home page

302.description: Redirect to home page after logout

post.description: Submit a new query for processing

get.description: Get the current status of a submitted query
Get the results of a completed query

post.description: Webhook endpoint for external services to update query status

get.description: Get information about the currently authenticated user
Get current user's preferences
Get all queries for the current user

delete.description: Permanently delete multiple user queries (cannot be restored)

put.description: Move multiple user queries to trash
Update the last_seen timestamp for a user query

sid.description: Save ID of the query to touch

get.description: Get all projects for the current user

post.description: Create a new project for the current user

delete.description: Permanently delete multiple user projects (cannot be restored)

put.description: Move multiple user projects to trash

get.description: Get all bookmarks for the current user
Get all tags for the current user
Get all saved data for the current user

post.description: Create or update user saved data

get.description: Get a specific user saved data item

put.description: Update a specific user saved data item

delete.description: Delete a specific user saved data item

get.description: Get all workspaces for the current user

post.description: Create a new workspace for the current user

get.description: Get a specific user workspace
Execute a demo query for a specific disease
Execute a demo query for a specific gene
Execute a demo query for a specific chemical

preferences.description: Map of preference names to preference value objects

pref_value.description: The preference value (can be any type based on pref_data_type)

pref_data_type.description: Data type of the preference value

time_updated.description: When the preference was last updated

QueryRequest.description: Query submission request - can be either a smart query or pathfinder query

pid.description: Project ID to associate with the query

type.description: Query type - determines what to find for the given entity

curie.description: CURIE identifier for the entity (e.g., MONDO:0007254 for drug queries, NCBIGene:55768 for gene queries, PUBCHEM.COMPOUND:5486971 for chemical queries)

direction.description: Direction of effect - required for gene and chemical queries, not applicable for drug queries

SmartQuery.description: Smart query for finding drugs, genes affected by chemicals, or chemicals affecting genes

pid.description: Project ID to associate with the query

constraint.description: Constraint category for pathfinding (optional intermediate category)

PathfinderQuery.description: Pathfinder query for finding paths between two entities

status.description: Query status - typically 'complete' for successful submissions

data.description: Query primary key (PK) - unique identifier for the submitted query

QuerySubmitResponse.description: Response from query submission containing status and query PK

aras.description: Array of ARA (Autonomous Relay Agent) names that have completed processing

QueryStatus.description: Query status response with processing information

QueryResults.description: Query results response containing summarized data

note_count.description: Number of notes associated with this query

time_updated.description: When the query was last updated

UserQuery.description: User query object with status and metadata

pks.description: Query PKs associated with the project
Query PKs to associate with the project
Query PKs to associate with the project

type.description: Type of query (what to find for the given entity)

allow_inbound.description: Whether this query can be accessed via inbound demo routes

allow_outbound.description: Whether this query is available in the frontend query list

direction.description: Direction of effect for gene/chemical queries

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the cached query

id.description: CURIE identifier for the entity (e.g., MONDO:0007254, NCBIGene:55768, PUBCHEM.COMPOUND:5486971)

meta.description: Metadata about the query and processing agents

paths.description: Map of path IDs to path objects

nodes.description: Map of node IDs to node objects from the knowledge graph

edges.description: Map of edge IDs to edge objects from the knowledge graph

publications.description: Map of publication IDs to publication objects

trials.description: Map of clinical trial IDs to trial objects

tags.description: Map of tag labels to tag descriptions for faceting

errors.description: Map of agent names to arrays of error messages

QuerySummary.description: Comprehensive summary of query results with all supporting data

aras.description: Array of ARA agent names that processed this query

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when results were processed

paths.description: Array of path IDs that support this result

tags.description: Map of tag labels to null (tags are defined in the main tags object)

subgraph.description: Array alternating between node IDs and edge IDs representing the path

aras.description: Array of ARA agent names that contributed to this path

curies.description: Array of CURIE identifiers for this node

descriptions.description: Array of descriptions for this node

names.description: Array of names for this node

types.description: Array of Biolink types for this node

is_root.description: Whether this is a root path edge

source.description: Source provenance information for the publication

name.description: Human-readable name of the information resource

wiki.description: Wiki URL for the information resource

knowledge_level.description: Knowledge level classification of the information resource

url.description: Main URL for the information resource

edge_bindings.description: Array of edge binding IDs from the TRAPI result

inverted_id.description: Edge ID for the inverted version of this edge (if applicable)

is_root.description: Whether this is a root path edge

complete.description: Whether the query processing is complete (for merged_version_available events)

merged_versions_list.description: List of [id, ara_name] pairs for merged versions (for merged_version_available events)

QueryUpdateRequest.description: ARS callback payload for query status updates
